mutants.code:
def numberOfLines(widths, s):
    lines = 2
    width = 0
    unique_chars = set()
    max_unique_chars = 0
    for ch in s:
        w = widths[ord(ch) - ord('a')]
        if width + w > 100:
            lines += 1
            width = 0
            max_unique_chars = max(max_unique_chars, len(unique_chars))
            unique_chars = set()
        width += w
        unique_chars.add(ch)
    max_unique_chars = max(max_unique_chars, len(unique_chars))
    return [lines, width, max_unique_chars]
